page.title: 14HOUSING
page.content: There are different kinds of houses in our village.Some are very old over a hundred years and some have been built only a few years ago. In the main part of the village they are mostly built of big blocks of grey {limestone.}Sometimes they are in terraces of four or five and others are built on top of banks and shops.Also there are houses standing on their own or in twos. Around the edge of the village are several{council estates.}Hillside is only a few years old.The houses are made of{mock stone}but look very attractive and are well equipped with fitted cupboards and central heating. Some houses are built for people with special jobs like the policemen.For old people there are{bungalows,}new blocks of{sheltered housing}and a big house converted into small flats.
